inn1.comm: length ball, angling across away from off stump, and Tamim puts his bat behind his pad to let it go
this one's on the stumps, on a fairly full length, and Tamim gets behind it solidly to defend
a touch shorter, angling across Tamim, and he's on the front foot and lets the ball come on before defending into the covers
back of a length on middle and off, blocked off the back foot

what a delivery, but very well played in the end. Slanted across, and then it swings back in, but Tamim trusts that it isn't coming back enough to threaten his off stump and leaves it alone by tucking his bat behind his pad
fullish, on the stumps, and Tamim clears his front leg and simply heaves it away over the midwicket boundary
takes off from just short of a good length on off stump, and hits Anamul on the glove as he looks to fend it away, somehow keeps it down into the off side
length ball outside off, left alone
a touch shorter now, and he leaves again
full, angling in towards off stump, defended into the off side
shortish ball, angling in and looking to tuck Anamul for room. He stands tall, lets it come on, and dabs it away towards third man
back of a length, angling across towards off stump. Tamim goes back and across to block it back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, a bit of shape away, and he pokes at it away from his body, pushes it to point
length ball on a fourth-stump line with a bit of late outswing. Left alone
fuller now, angled in towards off stump, clipped into the on side
down the leg side now, and Anamul can't connect with the glance but gets a healthy deflection off his thigh to the fine leg boundary
this one's quite wide outside off, and Anamul leaves it alone. He's getting some swing, but that's too far away from off stump to make him play
back of a length on leg stump, tucked off the hips towards deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, carries through at a nice height after Anamul leaves
super delivery, angling in and then straightening very late. Anamul came halfway forward and pushed at it and the ball beat his outside edge
a little wider now, and Anamul leaves comfortably
good ball again, angling in towards a fourth-stump line and straightening away. Anamul edges it but he played with fairly soft hands and it ran away along the ground to the third man boundary
short and wide and he gets on his toes to slap it away, doesn't quite middle it, slices it down to third man
length ball, angling away from a fairly full length on off stump. Tamim lets it go
shortish, wide outside off, swinging away. He looks to slap it away but his feet are stuck in cement and he can't connect
angled in towards middle stump, and he uses his wrists to tuck it away towards long leg
length ball outside off, fifth-stump line, left alone
a little fuller, much closer to off stump, and he gets on the front foot to defend
nice line, in the channel outside off, straightening away, and Anamul leaves it alone
full outside off, and he gets forward to push it towards short cover
length ball on middle and off, defended back towards the bowler
down the leg side again, and Tamim misses the flick around the corner but it runs off his front thigh, past the diving wicketkeeper
shortish, down the leg side again, but Anisur Rahman doesn't signal wide for this one, after Tamim shuffles across and misses the glance
full, angling away towards a fifth-stump line, and he gets a big stride forward to drive into the covers
back of a length on off. He looks to work it into the leg side, it goes past his closed bat face and hits him on the back thigh
full outside off, driven to the right of mid-off
fullish ball outside off, driven to mid-off
Lovely delivery, angling across, not as full as the previous one, and it kept moving away from Tamim. He came halfway forward and the ball beat his hesitant prod
a touch fuller now and he gets forward to defend into the covers
back of a length on middle and off, punched to mid-on off the back foot
back of a length outside off and Anamul unfurls a good-looking back-foot punch to the left of the man at cover
back of a length, angling in towards off, defended into the off side
length ball on off stump, angling away, defended into the covers
on the pads and it's clipped away towards deep square leg
overpitched, too straight, and it's clipped away neatly off the toes to the deep square leg boundary
full on off stump, blocked towards mid-on
full again, outside off this time, and Anamul lets it go
length ball outside off, left alone once more
down the track, and Tamim looks to launch it out of Dhaka, but the ball's angling away and too far away from him to connect
down the track again, makes a lot of room, and slashes it away towards third man
length ball, angling in towards off and straightening a touch. Anamul gets nicely behind it and defends towards point
length ball angling across towards off stump and he comes forward to defend into the off side. A bit of extra bounce there, and he takes his bottom hand off to keep it down
a bit fuller now and he comes forward and bunts it into the off side with soft hands, calls Anamul through for a quick single
full outside off and Anamul presses forward to defend into the off side
length ball on off stump, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
full on leg stump, clipped towards short midwicket
short ball, rising over shoulder height. Fine leg is inside the circle and Tamim just about clears him with his hook, even though he wasn't fully in control
short and wide and he stands tall and slaps it away to third man
down the leg side now and Moor puts in a sneaky appeal to try and put the umpire off calling it a wide, but there was a lot of distance between Tamim's bat and the ball
Tamim looks to work this length ball across the line, and it straightens and hits the flap of his pad. Umpire says no to the muted lbw appeal, it pitched outside leg
back of a length on off stump. Tamim goes back and across to defend
short, extremely wide outside off, and there's no way Anamul is going to connect with that slash
full, angling in, and he uses the angle to clip it from just outside off towards midwicket. He's overstepped by a long way

sees Tamim clearing his front leg and follows him with the full ball. Tamim looks to slog it over the leg side, and ends up scooping it high, into the hands of mid-off, but this is a free hit so that's okay
length ball angling in towards off and middle, tucked into the leg side
back of a length outside off, dabbed away towards third man
angles this down leg, and Tamim gets a bit of pad on it down towards square leg, after failing to connect with a flick
on the pads now and he clips it away wide of short midwicket
length ball outside off, and he comes forward and opens his bat face to steer it away to third man
full on middle and off, driven back firmly towards the bowler
flat and full on off stump, and he comes forward to block it back to the bowler
length ball, skids on with the angle towards off stump, and Tamim defends off the front foot
back of a length on the pads and he pushes that towards deep midwicket with a straight bat
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
full, a bit of width outside off, slapped straight to backward point
length ball, coming in from outside off, steered away to the right of the backward point fielder
length ball angling in towards off stump, defended back to the bowler
loud appeal from Moor for a caught behind down the leg side. There seemed to be a noise, but it's given wide. I think it clipped his back thigh
full outside off, and he blocks it towards short extra cover
back of a length on off stump. Anamul goes on the back foot to dab that towards point
length ball outside off. He looks to push it into the covers with an angled bat. Goes off the inside half of his bat, bounces into the ground and dribbles towards point
back of a length outside off, and he can't beat backward point with that stand-up slash
tossed up on off stump, punched firmly back to the bowler
length ball on middle stump. He gets his front foot across and tucks it away towards square leg
down the track now, doesn't quite reach the pitch. Looks to go over mid-on, ends up dragging it down to the man square on the leg side boundary
length ball, angling across outside off. Tamim comes forward and dabs it to short third man
makes room now, exposes all three stumps, and swings his bat through to loft that over the covers, well wide of the man running from long-off
flat, sliding towards the pads, and he clips it away to deep square leg
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, and he tucks it away to short midwicket
slants this down leg and Anamul clears his front leg and heaves it away to the fine leg boundary. The man running to his right from long leg had no chance
shot. That was full on middle and leg and now he swings freely through the line and launches it over mid-on
short and wide now and he gets on top of the bounce to cut but can't get it away past point
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
fullish, angling in towards off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, skids through with the angle, and he goes on the back foot and whips it away to long-on
full outside off, driven to long-off
quicker ball on off stump, and he comes forward to block it back to the bowler

good ball, this one hung much longer in the air outside off, and it dipped and beat Anamul for length as he pushed forward at it, away from his body, and turned away to take his edge down to the third man boundary
full, angled in towards middle stump, defended with soft hands off the front foot
on the pads now and it's nurdled away to the right of the short midwicket fielder
quick and full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short ball, sits up, and he has to wait a while before pulling it away to the right of deep midwicket
full now, on off stump, driven down to long-off
back of a length on leg stump, tucked off the hips towards square leg
tossed up very slow on middle and off, clipped away to deep midwicket
full down the leg side and he brings his bat down quickly to tickle that away to the fine leg boundary. Excellent placement
full on middle stump, clipped away into the gap between short fine leg and short midwicket
tossed up very full on off stump, jams his bat down to poke it back to the bowler
fullish on middle stump, flicked away towards deep square leg
quick and full on leg stump, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up slower on off stump and he drives inside out to short cover
length ball on off stump, punched firmly back to the bowler
googly, but it's short enough for Tamim to go on the back foot and punch it away with the turn towards point
full-toss outside off, looks to punch it hard into the covers, and ends up mistiming it down to long-off
another googly, and Tamim didn't seem to read that, played inside the line and is beaten outside off
a touch shorter on middle stump and he goes back to punch it back to the bowler
beautiful shot. Saw the flight on that, might have been another googly, and he got to the pitch of it, stayed inside the line, and drove it away with the turn past the diving short cover fielder
saw him coming down the pitch again and bowled it quicker. Tamim had to pad it away hurriedly
tossed up wide outside off and he drives it away towards the extra cover boundary and completes two and reaches his half-century by the time long-off can run around and cut it off
googly on off stump. Anamul punches it back to the bowler
flat and quick on middle and leg, tucked away towards short midwicket
another quick, flat ball that skids with the angle towards leg stump, defended towards short midwicket
fuller now and he looks to drive but can only hit it straight back towards the bowler
another fast, flat roller on off stump. Punched hard but straight to the bowler once again
slants the first one down the leg side and he tickles it away to the left of the short fine leg fielder
tossed up outside off, looks to drive to mid-off but the bowler moves quickly to his left to stop it
length ball on off stump, clipped with the turn to short midwicket
full-toss outside off, and he stands tall, moves inside the line, and slaps it away over cover, well wide of the man at long-off
quicker and flatter outside off, pushed down to long-on, with the turn
short, wide, slapped to the right of sweeper cover
full on off stump, defended to short extra cover
back of a length on leg stump, defended towards short midwicket
back of a length, skids with the angle towards off stump, punched down the ground towards long-off
quickish length ball on off stump, clipped to the left of the man at short midwicket
full outside off, driven down to long-off
on the pads now and he clips it away to the left of short fine leg
flat on the pads, and he glances it away neatly but straight to short fine leg
down the leg side again, clipped away to the left of short fine leg
flat, a touch short on off stump, and he quickly moves his front leg out of the way and plays a controlled pull down towards long-on
full outside off, driven to short extra cover
full on off stump, driven with a whip of the wrists back towards the bowler
nice shot, this. It's back of a length outside off, and he leans away and uses the pace of the ball to dab it away to the left of short third man
flat, angling across towards off stump, comes forward and looks to steer it towards backward point. Comes in a touch and runs away off his pad
length ball, fairly quick, on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away to the left of short fine leg
short ball, and he rocks back and pulls it over short midwicket, to the left of long-on
flat and quick on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg
full toss on off stump, driven to the left of long-off
length ball, a bit of loop outside off and he comes forward and dabs it away with an open face towards backward point
nice flight, dips and turns sharply to beat his inside edge as he comes forward to drive, and hits him on the front pad. LBW shout not given, it struck him outside the line
full outside off, pushed into the covers
a touch too straight and he goes on the back foot and works it away towards deep square leg
back of a length outside off, and he goes back and across to block it back to the bowler
full outside off and he comes forward and pushes it down the ground, past the stumps
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
full on the pads, clipped away towards square leg
full outside off, driven down to long-off

Oh my, that's unfortunate. They've gone to the third umpire, and it looks out. It's a slower ball on leg stump, and he works it away towards deep midwicket. They run a second and it would have been easily completed had Tamim not dropped his bat just short of reaching the bowler's end. He jammed it into the ground, looking to ground it, and it dropped out of his grasp. He had to jump into the crease, and his feet were in the air when Masakadza picked up Taylor's throw from the deep and disturbed the bails. For good measure, he threw to the other end as well, but obviously the ball became dead once Tamim was out at the bowler's end
length ball on leg stump, punched to short midwicket with a straight bat
length ball on off stump, whipped away towards square leg
shortish ball outside off, pulled away to deep midwicket
full and wide and he stretches forward to drive towards point
back of a length outside off and he goes back and across to punch it down to long-on
full outside off, driven to the right of long-off
full outside off, driven down to long-off
slower ball on off stump, driven down to long-on
back of a length outside off, punched towards mid-off
length ball on leg stump, pushed to mid-on with a straight bat
fullish outside off, driven to sweeper cover
length ball, slanting away from Mominul, who gets down low and looks to slash through the off side but the ball beats his outside edge
a touch shorter and he stands up and slaps it to point
appeal for lbw after he beats the inside edge with one that straightens from middle stump as he goes back to punch through the off side. Too high, hit him on the thigh
fuller now and he comes forward to clip it towards deep midwicket
this one slid through with the angle and hit Mominul on the pad as he looked to flick it into the leg side. Was going down leg
back of a length, punched to short cover
full-toss outside off, clubbed away towards deep midwicket
length ball on off stump and he shuffles across to clip it away to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, and he shuffles across to tuck it away towards deep square leg
full and wide outside off, sliced away towards third man
length ball on leg stump, punched to long-on for the strolled single
full, slanting away from Mominul, steered down to third man
back of a length slower ball that cuts in towards off stump. Anamul waits on it and punches it down to long-off
back of a length wide outside off, and he slaps it straight to point but the fielder fumbles to allow the batsmen to complete the sixth single of the over
length ball on off stump, driven down to long-off
back of a length on middle and off, goes on the back foot to push it towards short midwicket, who dives to his left and gets a hand to it but can't stop the single
full on leg stump, clipped away to the left of mid-on
full on middle stump, nudged into the gap between short midwicket and short fine leg
short outside off and he makes room to slap it through the off side but hits it straight to short extra cover
short outside off and he swivels his hips through the pull but doesn't quite middle it, sends it rolling away to the left of mid-on
length ball wide outside off. Mominul looked to reach out and launch it over cover but only managed an outside edge to short third man. It may have deflected off the keeper's gloves
full on middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, pushed down to long-on
full, angling in towards middle stump, driven down to long-on
shortish outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
fullish outside off, and he comes forward and steers it to backward point
back of a length on leg stump, clipped away to deep square leg
full, angling in towards middle stump, punched back to the bowler
shortish on middle and leg, whipped away towards mid-on
short, wide, slapped away to the right of cover, and that runs away quickly to the extra cover boundary
short and down the leg side now, pulled to deep square leg
short outside off, cut away towards sweeper cover
full outside off, driven to Taylor at sweeper cover
short and wide and Anamul accepts the gift, slashing it away between backward point and short third man
slower ball floated up outside off, driven down to long-off
got him! Mominul hasn't been middling them today and he went after this slower ball outside off, hit it too early, with an angled bat, and scooped a simple catch to mid-off
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot into the off side
full outside off, steered down to third man
short ball, stops on the batsman as it turns away outside off and he waits a long time before playing a flick-pull towards midwicket
short on off stump and he makes room and slaps it away, with the angle, between cover and short extra cover
back of a length outside off, and he shuffles across to work it with the turn towards midwicket
full on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
shortish outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
slow, a touch short outside off, and he goes back and across to punch it down to long-on
he won't get his hundred, and a pretty ordinary ball has got him out. It's short, angling towards leg stump, and he pulls it, uppishly, straight into the hands of deep midwicket
goes back to a length ball on off stump, defends back towards the bowler
on the pads now, clipped towards square leg
legbreak turning down the leg side, tucked away towards short fine leg
length ball on off stump, goes back and punches it down to long-off
fullish on off stump, and Mushfiqur presses forward to defend
full-toss on middle stump, clears his front leg and clubs it away towards deep midwicket
angled across outside off and he slaps it away towards short third man
down the leg side, swept away to deep backward square leg
back of a length, punched towards cover point
full on leg stump and he clears his front leg to heave it away to the right of long-on
length ball on leg stump, tucked away to the left of short fine leg
full on middle stump, clipped away towards long-on
down the track now, and swats it over the infield, drops well short of long-on. Didn't time it at all
goes for the slog-sweep from wide outside off, spoons it uppishly and deep midwicket ran in to try and catch it but it dropped short of him
short, down the leg side, pulled down to short fine leg. Didn't middle that
down the track now, not quite to the pitch. I think he was looking to go over the bowler, but ends up hitting it towards long-on, with one hand off the handle
length ball outside off, driven to extra cover
full and wide, driven hard but straight to long-off
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
full-toss and a lot of width outside off. Shakib comes forward and drives between cover and extra cover
makes room to hit through the same region, and hits it uppishly, but the ball drops a few feet short of the extra cover fielder
back of a length on off stump, and he forces it away off the back foot, down to long-off
length ball, angling in towards middle and off, tucked away towards square leg
back of a length outside off. He waits on it and steers it down to short third man with an open face
down the track, clears his front leg, but barely manages to time that, sends that slog rolling towards midwicket
full on off stump, driven down to long-off
sees him shaping for the slog sweep and fires it in quick and short. He looks to adjust and work it into the leg side but the ball is too quick and he's hit on the body
down the track now and that's a lovely shot. Gets inside the line, head down over the ball, and uses his wrists to force that drive to the cover boundary
full outside off, drags this drive down to long-off, via a deflection off the bowler's fingertips
down the track now, gets inside the line, and pulls this shortish ball down towards deep square leg
low full-toss on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle stump. Shuffles across and bunts it down into the on side
full-toss on off stump, goes hard at it, drags it down to deep midwicket
another full-toss, and this time he gets hold of it, doesn't go too hard, simply whips it away over the leaping square leg fielder
shortish, opens up and pulls it down to deep midwicket
length ball angling across towards off stump. Shakib clears his front leg and swats it away to the right of the square leg umpire
looks to slant it away from Shakib, seeing him shape to make room, and overdoes it completely, slinging it miles wide of off stump
full-toss outside off, flat-batted down the ground, and Maruma does well to tumble to his left and stop it at long-off

four lucky runs for Shakib. Goes for that big mow over the leg side once more, the angle causes him to top-edge it and it loops over the gap between the keeper and short third man and bounces away for four
wide yorker, not sure that's a great idea with third man in the ring, and Shakib almost squeezes it past him, but the fielder dives to his right to stop the ball. And the bowler overstepped as well
takes a big step across the stumps even before the bowler has delivered. It's a pretty good ball, full and just outside off, and he drags that attempted slog along the ground to deep square leg
full-toss outside off, clubbed away to deep midwicket
in the blockhole on off stump, dug out towards mid-off
full and wide, and he gets down low to launch it over the covers
short ball, and he cuts it away for another boundary
cut away to sweeper cover
short again, and he cuts once more, to the left of the man at sweeper cover
down the leg side and now he brings out that slog-sweep, high and clean over the midwicket boundary. 18 off the over. Bangladesh have scored 34 in the last two.
bangs it in short, and Shakib goes for the hook. Can't control it, and he top-edges high in the air down to long leg, where Chigumbura takes a good tumbling catch
length ball on off stump, and he clips it away with the angle towardsshort midwicket
slower ball just outside off, and he can only block it straight back to the bowler
short now, and Mahmudullah gets away a lucky boundary, goes for the pull and bottom-edges it past the short fine leg fielder
short again, and this time he pulls it round to deep square leg
gone! What an over from Panyangara. Mushy went for the big drive through the off side with an angled bat, it was very full and it was angling in, and it took his inside edge onto the stumps
angling down the leg side, and Mahmudullah looks to tickle it fine but can't get it past short fine leg
full on the pads, clipped away to deep square leg
short outside off, pulled to deep square leg
fullish on off stump, and he whips it away towards deep midwicket
in the blockhole but a little too leg-stumpish, and Mamudullah plays a classy-looking clip that runs away to the left of the short fine leg fielder
full outside off, comes in a touch, and he presses forward to push it down to mid-off
low full-toss outside off, pushes it down towards long-on
full, angling in towards off stump, presses forward and looks for the push to mid-off, can't get it past the bowler
short and wide and Sabbir slashes it away over point. Was looking for the slower ball, but dragged it too short
full and wide this time and now he drives it firmly to sweeper cover. Panyangara overstepped there, not by much but overstepped nonetheless
full and wide, driven straight to extra cover
full again, outside off, driven hard but straight to mid-off
full-toss outside off, clipped away to deep square leg
in the blockhole, follows the batsman as he backs away outside leg stump, and sneaks between bat and pad as he looks to whip it away
full outside off stump, and he can't get the drive away past the cover fielder

full once again, outside off, driven straight to cover and this time they get a single as well as an overthrow, with the throw missing the stumps at the bowler's end and running away towards deep square leg
shot. That was a full-toss, angling in towards leg stump, and he thrust his foot across and lap-swept it over short fine leg's head
full outside off, flat-batted down to long-off and they take on Sibabda's arm and run a second. Mahmudullah had to dive into the crease at the end and a better throw could have had him in trouble
slower ball outside off and Sabbir is beaten trying to carve that away through cover
looks for the yorker, bowls a low full-toss on off stump, and he clears his front leg and swipes it away between deep midwicket and long-on
full outside off, jabbed away towards cover
short ball, angling across the batsman, and he pulls it away to deep midwicket
wide yorker, and that is a super shot from Mahmudullah, jams his bat down on it and squeezes it away into the gap to the right of backward point
bouncer now, and Mahmudullah shuffles across looking for the hook, can't connect
another wide yorker, and this time deep point is in place to cut off Mahmudullah's jab
yorker on middle and leg, clipped into the midwicket area
full on leg stump, clears his front leg and swipes it away to deep midwicket
lovely yorker on middle stump, he digs it out towards mid-on
wow. That was full outside off, and he read the line and quickly adjusted to reverse-sweep it between the keeper and short third man
fullish on middle and leg, slugged away to the right of long-on

short ball, it was the slower one, and he looks to pull and ends up hitting it uppishly into the hands of long-on. The fielder is right on the edge of the rope and he's moving back with the momentum of the catch but manages to stop himself just in time, from going over the rope
full outside off, and Mahmudullah can't force it away past cover
low full-toss outside off and he shuffles across and simply whips it away wide of long-on. Super timing
slower bouncer outside off. Mahmudullah is through his pull too quickly, and he's beaten
shortish ball, doesn't bounce too much, and he heaves it away towards deep square leg
full, slanting away outside off, and Mashrafe, who initially made room, looks to reach out and slap it away but can't connect
full outside off, and he throws his bat at it and slices it up in the air, drops to the ground between mid-off and cover

inn2.comm: back of a length outside off, blocked off the back foot towards point
length ball on middle and off, defended from the crease
takes a couple of steps down the pitch, Mashrafe drops it a touch shorter, and he defends into the on side
length ball on a fourth-stump line, defended into the off side
back of a length, angling in towards middle and off, blocked into the off side after he took a couple of steps out of his crease

straightens after angling in towards middle and off, and a bit of extra bounce too. Masakadza is opened up, but he drops the ball down into the off side with soft hands, taking his bottom hand off the bat handle
down the track, looks to slog the back of a length ball over the leg side. It straightens a bit and it runs off the bottom of his bat into the cover point region
short, angling down the leg side, and he puts it away easily. Fine leg is in the circle and he simply swivels around and whips it away to the left of the fielder
new one's just as good as the old one. It's a back of a length ball outside off, and he gets on his toes and punches it away to the right of backward point
once again, lovely back-foot punch. This one's hit a little further in front of square and Arafat dives to his left at cover to stop the ball
full and wide, swinging away from the batsman and he goes for the big drive and the ball beats his outside edge
back of a length, angling in towards middle and off, defended back to the bowler
back of a length, angling in towards middle and off, tucking him up for room. Sibanda defends into the on side
got him. Comes down the track and goes for the pull. It gets a little too big on him, and he ended up scooping it high in the air, easy catch for the man running in from long leg
saw him making some room, followed him with a length ball angling in towards leg stump. He tucks it away towards short midwicket
shot! This is a fullish ball from a pace bowler, outside off, and he gets on the front foot and sweeps him over the deep backward square leg boundary
back of a length now, and he bunts it down towards mid-on for the quick single
back of a length on off stump, defended towards point
back of a length on middle stump, punched to short extra cover
down the track, and the bowler gives him enough width to send that skimming flat over cover, Went to the boundary in an instant

back of a length, comes in towards off stump, and he looks to work it into the leg side, and inside-edges it onto his pad, into the off side. Actually, there's no bat on that, but the umpire didn't signal leg byes
looks to angle this in again, overdoes it a little, slides it well down the leg side
another in-ducker from outside off, and Maruma is halfway forward. Pokes at it, a little late on it, and he was beaten by both pace and movement. Slippery delivery, that
back of a length outside off, punched to point
length ball outside off, left alone

given! There was a loud shout for a catch down the leg side after Masakadza looked to glance one off his hips, and Masakadza is absolutely livid. He slaps the air with his bat a couple of times as he walks off, and one of the Zimbabwe substitutes came on and put an arm around his shoulder to lead him off the field. You could see why he was disappointed, he was nowhere near making contact with that.
big appeal for lbw first ball, not given. It came in a bit as he pushed at it from halfway forward, but he got a huge inside-edge onto his pad
muted appeal for lbw, this one was clearly going down the leg. A bit of movement again and he couldn't connect with the flick

short, rising towards the ribcage, and he gets a bit of glove on it to tickle it away to the left of the keeper and into the fine leg boundary. Could so easily have been two catches down the leg side in one over
back of a length outside off, punched towards point off the back foot
back of a length outside off, gets back and across to defend
back of a length outside off, kept a little low, defends safely enough off the back foot
down the leg side, and it runs away for five wides. Mushy threw himself to his left, got a glove to it, but couldn't stop the ball from rolling away to the boundary
back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
short ball outside off, he looked to cut and the ball bounced over his outside edge
back of a length, tucking him up for room, defended into the off side
back of a length, outside off, defended off the back foot
on the pads now and Maruma flicks it away elegantly to the square leg boundary

that looked extremely close, but the umpire didn't think so. It came in and beat his inside edge as he tried to drive down the ground, and hit him on the front pad in front of middle stump. He was only halfway forward. Very very close.
back of a length, jags back in from outside off, punched down the ground off the back foot
fuller, wide outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
back of a length on a fourth-stump line. Shuffles across to defend into the covers
fuller now, angling in towards off stump. He comes forward to drive through the off side, playing way out in front of his body, and gets an inside-edge towards mid-on

back of a length, stopped on the batsman as he went back and across to defend. Hit him high on the bat and nearly popped back to the bowler, but he played close to his body and the ball dropped down a few feet in front of the batsman
angled in again, back of a length, and he goes back and defends towards the on side
back of a length outside off, he shuffles a long way and blocks it into the covers
short, wide, and he hops in the air to get on top of the bounce and cut it away past the left hand of the diving backward point fielder
fuller now, outside off, and he shuffles across his stumps to defend to short cover
gone! It was shortish, goes for the pull, and doesn't get hold of it at all. Spoons it in the air, straight into the hands of Mashrafe at mid-on
length ball outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, and he punches it away to the right of the short cover fielder, staying nicely side-on through the shot

another lbw shout, but this one was a simpler decision, I guess, he had got his front foot just about outside the line, and height may have also been an issue. Another incoming ball, beat the inside edge as he pushed at it in front of his body
back of a length, defended into the off side
fuller now, outside off, and he presses nicely forward to block to short cover
back of a length, a bit of width outside off, but he can't force it away past the point fielder
back of a length outside off, punched firmly into the ground and it bounces over the diving point fielder, down to the right of third man
back of a length, angling in towards middle stump, defended to mid-on
back of a length on off stump, defended towards short cover
shortish, rising towards the ribs, and he gets on his toes to keep that down in front of short midwicket
full on off stump, punched firmly back past the stumps, and Mashrafe, chasing back from mid-on and diving, can't quite stop it at the rope. Didn't time his dive right.
short, angling in towards middle and off, and he gets on his toes to defend into the off side
full outside off and he comes forward to drive that to sweeper cover
length ball, angling in towards off stump, and he defends with an open face towards point
short outside off, swatted down to deep square leg
the full, wide tempter. Taylor isn't tempted
back of a length outside off, dabbed away to backward point
back of a length, angling in, lets the ball come on and run off his bat face to backward point
tossed up outside off, looked like the offbreak, driven to short cover
back of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
short ball, a legbreak that didn't turn, punched down to long-on
length ball on middle and leg, defended into the on side
back of a length on off stump, pushed down the ground to long-off
this hurries on with the angle towards off stump, and keeps a little low, but he manages to defend off the back foot into the off side
angled in quick towards off stump, a bit of turn away. He takes a couple of steps down the pitch and defends
back of a length now, punched down to long-on
length ball on off stump. He stays back and pokes it into the covers
a little more air and he comes forward to drive it to long-off

missed stumping, but it was a very very hard chance. He took a step out of his crease and looked to work it through the on side. Ball turned sharply and beat his edge and went very quickly to the right of the keeper and ran away to the boundary
length ball on the stumps, worked away towards midwicket
looks to reverse-sweep him from leg and middle. Was dismissed playing that shot in the previous game. This time he just about middles it, into the ground and towards first slip
tossed up, driven to long-off
a little wider outside off and Anamul throws himself to his right to stop that firm drive from Mire
quicker, not as full, and he's half forward to defend in front of off stump
fuller now, goes with the arm as he looks to defend, off the inside half of the bat into the on side
another arm ball, slides down the leg side as he looks to go back and work it into the leg side

a bit slower outside off and he comes forward and pushes it towards cover point. They run the quick single, but Taylor had to dive to make the crease before the underarm throw came in. The throw was wide of the stumps and Mushfiqur couldn't collect cleanly as he tried to pick up and swoop towards the stumps in one moment
full on middle and leg, swiped down to long-on
a bit of air outside off and Taylor says thank you, goes down on one knee and slogs it to the vacant deep midwicket boundary
now he makes room and drills this full, leg-stump ball to the right of the diving cover fielder. Top shot
and another. It's a length ball outside off, and he simply goes through the line with a straight bat and a full extension of his arms to loft that over extra cover
looks to turn this ball into the leg side, and it straightens and bounces and hits him on the thigh
full outside off, driven to long-off
length ball, angling into the pads, tucked away towards square leg
back of a length, angling in towards leg stump, and he blocks it into the off side after making room
length ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
again goes with the angle, hurries through and hits him on the back thigh as he makes room to play it on the off side
back of a length on off stump, punched to cover
full and quick on leg stump, blocked back to the bowler
shortish outside off, chopped down to cover
and again. A bit of width offered but he can't get that punch past cover
fuller, angling in towards middle and leg, defended into the off side
angled in again. This time he goes on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
length ball outside off, left alone. Goes with the angle and doesn't miss off stump by much
full outside off, driven to cover
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot
full, a bit of drift in towards leg stump, driven down to long-on
tossed up, angling in towards middle and leg, blocked into the off side
goes with the angle as he tries to work it leg side, and it beats the inside edge and hits him on the pad. Was slanting down the leg side
now he gets one to turn sharply. It hung in the air outside off and dipped and turned past the outside edge as he tried to push it through the covers

got him! The previous balls built up in the batsman's head and he rushed down the track and slogged wildly. It sneaked under his bat, went with the angle, and Mushfiqur was a little slow to complete the stumping, but the batsman was so far down the pitch that it didn't matter
angled in down the leg side and he can't get his bat around quickly enough to work it through the leg side. Hit on the front pad
tossed up, angled in towards off stump, defended off the front foot
turns a long way from outside leg, beats the outside edge and hits the back pad as he looks to work it through the leg side
comes forward, blocks it back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, chopped towards cover
gone! That was the arm ball again, and Taylor plonked his front pad right in front and played down the wrong line as he looked to defend. It looked plumb and the umpire had no hesitation
length ball on off stump, comes forward to defend back to the bowler
full, darted in towards leg stump, pushed to mid-on

another arm ball, and this one was floated up, following the batsman as he looked to make room. He tried to drive through the off side and it went through the gate and ran away for four byes, to the left of the keeper
length ball angled in towards middle stump, defended back to the bowler
full down the leg side, clipped to short fine leg
arm ball again, and he looks to defend and gets an inside edge into the leg side
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
full, angling in towards middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
full on middle stump, driven inside-out to long-off
down the track now and he holds it back a bit, bowls it slower, and he has to stretch out to defend it outside off
down the track now, and Chigumbura gets to the pitch and goes through the line with a full follow-through to clear the long-on boundary
goes for the drive through cover even as it comes in with the angle, places it to the left of the sweeper cover fielder
goes back to a length ball and it keeps low and goes with the arm. He manages to keep it out in front of off stump with a straight bat
down the track now, blocked back to the bowler
shortish, a bit of width, cut hard but straight to point
goes back again as this slides in towards off stump, punches it to short cover
angled in with that round-arm angle. He goes on the back foot to punch it back to the bowler
shortish, turns and bounces outside off and beats the top edge as he makes room to cut
length ball on off stump, defended towards point
short ball, slapped away but point moves quickly to his right to stop it
quicker now, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length, makes room and punches it to sweeper cover
lots of turn from off stump, slightly short, and it turns down the leg side as he tries to work it away into the on side
back of a length outside off, dabbed to short third man
shortish and a bit of width, cut away to the left of the man at sweeper cover
length ball, stays on the back foot and works it away with the turn towards deep square leg
back of a length, a lot of turn in, but he manages to make room and punch it into the covers
again back of a length, turns in towards middle stump, and he works it off the back foot through midwicket
makes room and goes for the cut, it keeps a bit low and sneaks under his bat
back of a length on middle stump, gets a bit of turn and bounce as he goes on the back foot, and beats the outside edge as he closes his bat face to flick it
looks to cut, not much room, chops it to point
full outside off, driven to long-off
full on off stump, he plays a checked drive to long-off
shorter now, and he goes back to punch it to sweeper cover
a bit of air and he comes forward and drives to sweeper cover
full on leg stump, clipped towards short midwicket
back of a length on off stump, pushed into the off side
down the track now, pushed back to the bowler
a bit of flight and he drives towards mid-off
full on leg stump, Chakabva clips it past the diving short midwicket fielder
down the leg side and he whips it off his pads to deep backward square leg
tossed up on leg stump, driven inside-out to long-off
full on middle and off, driven down to long-on
a bit of air, driven firmly to long-off
a touch shorter and he goes on the back foot to punch to extra cover
full on the pads, clipped to short midwicket
fired in flat on off stump, punched back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, forced away towards deep point. Misfield allows them to run two
back of a length again, he lets it come on and dabs it to short third man
down the track now, pushes it back to the bowler
that was always on the cards. Chakabva had been making room repeatedly and cutting balls off his stumps. This one went with the arm, went across him, and crashed into off stump. Kept a touch low too.
goes back and across to this back of a length ball, defends it solidly, close to his body
a bit of air on this and he comes forward to defend
length ball, angling in towards off stump, pushed into the covers off the front foot
fullish outside off, a bit of shape in, but Moor leaves it comfortably enough
length ball angling in towards off stump, defended into the covers
length ball outside off and he goes poking away from his body and the ball beats his outside edge. Absolutely no footwork there
back of a length, angling in towards middle and off, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
bouncer to end the over, and he half-ducks, half-sways out of the way
back of a length on off stump, makes room and forces it away towards deep point
length ball, turns in towards leg stump, worked away towards square leg
on the pads once more and he nurdles it away towards square leg
and again, a touch short and a touch too straight, and he goes deep in his crease to work it into the leg side
a bit of air now and he comes forward to drive inside-out to sweeper cover
on the pads now and he whips it away to deep backward square leg
short outside off and Chigumbura leans back to force it away towards deep point
big lbw appeal, given. He came half-forward to work it into the on side, and it was fasy and angling in. Beat the inside edge and hit him on the back pad, right in front
fullish outside off, and it beats the outside edge as he presses forward to defend. Was quite late on the shot
back of a length outside off, and he pushed hard at it with hard hands and got a thick outside edge down to third man
bouncer, and Madziva ducks low under it. Rises very high, and the umpire signals wide
full outside off, and he presses forward to drive, and the ball beats his outside edge again
back of a length outside off, turning in, goes on the back foot to defend
length ball, a bit of width outside off, and he steers it away to deep point
back of a length, angling in towards middle stump, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball outside off and he pushes forward to block into the off side, gets a thick outside edge that slip can't quite cut off on the dive, despite getting a hand to it
back of a length on off and middle, tucked into the on side
length ball wide outside off, looks to force it away square with a flat bat and the ball bounces over his top edge
length ball outside off, presses forward and blocks towards the slips
down the track, doesn't get to the pitch, and it goes with the arm and hits him on the body, into the on side
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full, angling in towards off and middle, driven back to the bowler
shortish ball outside off and Madziva frees his arms to slog that over wide mid-on. Didn't quite middle it
length ball outside off, presses forward to steer that to backward point
good bouncer, angling in and following the batsman, who crouches his head under it to let it go
slower ball outside off, and he comes out of his crease to defend back to the bowler
yorker on leg stump and he clips it away to the fine leg boundary
looks to sweep from outside off, gets unbalanced as he does so and can't get the ball past short fine leg
down the track now, clips it to short midwicket
got him. That was full on middle and leg, and he cleared his front leg and smashed it straight to short midwicket, who falls to his left to take a good catch
beauty. That was looped up outside off and he came forward, playing for the turn, and it went with the arm, through the gate, and crashed into his off stump
tossed up, angled down the leg side, and Chigumbura clears his front leg and launches it over midwicket
a little quicker, on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
down the leg side, looks to sweep, goes off the pad to short fine leg
keeps a little low, but he manages to defend it off the back foot, into the off side
down the track now, driven down the ground to long-off
shout for lbw for the full ball speared into the pads. Looked like it was sliding down leg
length ball outside off, makes some room and flat-bats it to long-off, refuses the single
flat, angling in towards leg stump, keeps a bit low. Goes back and chops down hurriedly into the off side
again it skids on with the angle, goes back and makes room to cut, can't beat backward point
flat and quick, sliding down leg, tries to whip it through the on side and misses, is hit on the front pad
down the track, and he frees his arms and launches it straight back down the ground, lovely clean hit
full, angling into the pads, clipped to square leg
goes on the back foot to work it leg side, is hit on the pad by the arm ball, was definitely sliding down
goes on the back foot again, this time he manages to tuck it away towards short fine leg
full outside off and he drives sweetly through the gap between mid-off and cover
a bit slower, drops onto a good length outside off, and he reaches out and blocks into the off side
quick arm ball heading towards off stump, he gets everything behind the line to defend
fired flat down the leg side, and he helps it away past short fine leg to bring up his half-century
now he makes room to cut, and makes a crisp connection but can't beat point
down the track and that's a slightly mistimed hit down the ground, rolls down to long-on
length ball, slides on towards off stump. He makes room and punches into the covers

and that is that. It's a little fuller, the arm ball again, sliding towards off stump. He clears his front leg and goes for the big slog sweep and plays all around the ball, which crashes into his stumps
